filmography.title: One Wild Oat
filmography.role_description: A very early minor role as a receptionist in this British comedy, marking one of her first screen appearances.
filmography.plot: A barrister attempts to discourage his daughter's infatuation with a philanderer, leading to a series of comedic misunderstandings.

filmography.title: Laughter in Paradise
filmography.role_description: A brief but charming appearance as a cigarette girl that showcased her natural screen presence before she became a star.
filmography.plot: A practical joker leaves a fortune to his four relatives, provided they perform tasks completely against their nature.

filmography.title: The Lavender Hill Mob
filmography.role_description: A small but memorable cameo as a woman who briefly interacts with the protagonists in the opening scene of this classic Ealing comedy.
filmography.plot: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

filmography.title: Young Wives' Tale
filmography.role_description: A shy lodger who becomes entangled in the domestic complications of two couples sharing a house in post-war London.
filmography.plot: In post-war Britain, a housing shortage forces two couples to share a house, leading to comic misunderstandings with a new lodger.

filmography.title: Secret People
filmography.role_description: A young dancer who is drawn into a plot to assassinate a dictator, showcasing her ballet training on screen.
filmography.plot: A woman and her younger sister flee to London to escape a European dictator, only to be drawn into a plot against him years later.

filmography.title: Monte Carlo Baby
filmography.role_description: A young actress who gets involved in a mix-up over a missing baby; this film led to her discovery by Colette for 'Gigi'.
filmography.plot: Confusion ensues when a baby is mistaken for the child of a wealthy movie star.

filmography.title: Roman Holiday
filmography.role_description: A bored European princess who escapes her guardians to explore Rome incognito, falling in love with an American reporter.
filmography.plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

filmography.title: Sabrina
filmography.role_description: The chauffeur's daughter who returns from Paris as a sophisticated woman, capturing the attention of two wealthy brothers.
filmography.plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

filmography.title: War and Peace
filmography.role_description: A vibrant young Russian aristocrat whose life and loves are swept up in the turmoil of Napoleon's invasion of Russia.
filmography.plot: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

filmography.title: Funny Face
filmography.role_description: A shy bookstore clerk and amateur philosopher who is discovered by a fashion photographer and swept away to Paris to become a model.
filmography.plot: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion standard and a new muse.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Love in the Afternoon
filmography.role_description: The young cello-playing daughter of a private detective who becomes fascinated by, and eventually entraps, a notorious American playboy.
filmography.plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

filmography.title: Green Mansions
filmography.role_description: A mysterious girl living in the Venezuelan jungle who communicates with birds and falls in love with a fugitive explorer.
filmography.plot: A young man seeking gold in the Venezuelan jungle meets a girl who speaks to birds and knows the secrets of the forest.

filmography.title: The Nun's Story
filmography.role_description: A headstrong Belgian woman who enters a convent to serve in the Congo, but struggles against the vow of obedience and her own conscience.
filmography.plot: After entering a convent, an independent-minded Belgian woman struggles with her vows, particularly the vow of obedience.

filmography.title: The Unforgiven
filmography.role_description: A young woman raised by a frontier family who becomes the center of a conflict when it is revealed she is of Native American birth.
filmography.plot: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

filmography.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
filmography.role_description: A flighty, eccentric New York socialite with a hidden past who forms a bond with her new neighbor, a struggling writer.
filmography.plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

filmography.title: The Children's Hour
filmography.role_description: A schoolteacher whose life and career are destroyed when a malicious student accuses her and her colleague of having a lesbian relationship.
filmography.plot: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of having a lesbian affair.

filmography.title: Charade
filmography.role_description: A widow in Paris who finds herself pursued by several men seeking a fortune her murdered husband stole, forcing her to trust a mysterious stranger.
filmography.plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Who can she trust?

filmography.title: Paris When It Sizzles
filmography.role_description: A secretary hired to help a hungover screenwriter finish a script in two days, acting out the scenes as they write them.
filmography.plot: A screenwriter with writer's block hires a secretary to help him finish his script, and they act out the possible scenarios.

filmography.title: My Fair Lady
filmography.role_description: A poor Cockney flower seller who becomes the subject of a wager by a phonetics professor claiming he can transform her into a high-society lady.
filmography.plot: Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.

filmography.title: How to Steal a Million
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a legendary art forger who teams up with a cat burglar to steal one of her father's fakes from a museum before it can be tested.
filmography.plot: A woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries is assisted by a man.

filmography.title: Two for the Road
filmography.role_description: A woman whose twelve-year marriage is examined through non-linear flashbacks of various road trips taken with her husband across France.
filmography.plot: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of their twelve-year marriage.

filmography.title: Wait Until Dark
filmography.role_description: A recently blinded woman who must use her wits and heightened senses to survive when three criminals invade her apartment looking for a heroin-filled doll.
filmography.plot: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

filmography.title: Robin and Marian
filmography.role_description: An older, wiser Marian who has become an abbess, reuniting with an aging Robin Hood when he returns from the Crusades.
filmography.plot: Robin Hood returns from the Crusades to woo Maid Marian and settle the score with the Sheriff of Nottingham.

filmography.title: Bloodline
filmography.role_description: The heiress to a pharmaceutical empire who becomes the target of a murder plot after her father's suspicious death.
filmography.plot: A woman inherits her father's pharmaceutical company and investigates his death, suspecting one of the board members.

filmography.title: They All Laughed
filmography.role_description: An elegant woman who becomes the object of a private detective's affection in this ensemble romantic comedy.
filmography.plot: Three private detectives follow three women for their jealous husbands, but end up falling in love with the women they are tailing.

filmography.title: Always
filmography.role_description: A graceful angel who guides a deceased pilot, helping him transition to the afterlife and let go of his past.
filmography.plot: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend he left behind.
